{{cpp/thread/unique_lock/title|owns_lock}}
{{cpp/thread/unique_lock/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++11|1=
bool owns_lock() const noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Checks whether {{c|*this}} owns a locked mutex or not.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
{{c|true}} if {{c|*this}} has an associated mutex and has acquired ownership of it, {{c|false}} otherwise.
